meanings.definition: A style of animation that originated in Japan and is characterized by colorful artwork and fantastical themes.
meanings.sent1: My little sister loves watching anime with magical creatures and bright colors.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching anime because of its vibrant art and imaginative stories.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would be so into anime about talking animals, but here I am, hooked!
meanings.sent4: The world of anime is like a kaleidoscope of creativity, each show a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The anime I watched last night was so visually stunning, it felt like stepping into a dream.

meanings.definition: A Japanese animated film or television show.
meanings.sent1: My friend recommended a new anime for me to watch this weekend.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching anime on Saturday mornings with a bowl of cereal.
meanings.sent3: The anime we watched last night had us laughing so hard we couldn't breathe.
meanings.sent4: Watching anime is like going on an adventure without leaving your living room.
meanings.sent5: The anime series I binged last week had me on the edge of my seat the whole time.
